ED_Title: Report  of the Secretary-General on the work of the Organization
ED_DecisionText:
A.

At its 51st plenary meeting, on 28 January 2021, the General Assembly decided that, after the departure of the Secretary-General, his seat at the podium might be occupied by his representative. 

B.
	At its 52nd plenary meeting, on 29 January 2021, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Secretary-General on the work of the Organization (A/75/1).
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
